title: Wild rice and sausage stuffing
ingredients: ['230ml water', '400g uncooked wild rice', '110g butter', '450g pork sausage meat', '400g chopped onions', '250g chopped celery', '170g chopped mushrooms', '1 1/2 teaspoons dried thyme', '1 1/2 teaspoons dried rosemary', '2 teaspoons salt', '1 1/2 teaspoons pepper', '280g cubed wholemeal bread', '2 large cooking apples - peeled, cored, and chopped', '160g raisins', '430ml chicken stock']
